description: This file defines API routes for a financial tracking application using FastAPI. It includes endpoints for user authentication, transaction management, and dashboard analytics, interacting with a database via SQLAlchemy models.

methods.name: register_user(user_in: UserCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Registers a new user account, returns user details.

methods.name: login_user(credentials: UserLogin, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Authenticates user and returns JWT token.

methods.name: create_transaction( trx_in: TransactionCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Creates a new transaction for the logged-in user.

methods.name: list_transactions( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), skip: int = 0, limit: int = 50 )
methods.description: Lists all transactions for the logged-in user.

methods.name: get_transaction( trx_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Retrieves a specific transaction by ID.

methods.name: update_transaction( trx_id: int, update: TransactionUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
delete_transaction( trx_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
get_dashboard_stats( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Provides financial summary including income, expense, and recent transactions.

methods.name: category_analytics( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Returns spending analytics per category against static budgets.

ctags.name: category_analytics
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.name: create_transaction
ctags.signature: ( trx_in: TransactionCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.name: delete_transaction
ctags.signature: ( trx_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.name: get_dashboard_stats
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.name: get_transaction
ctags.signature: ( trx_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.name: list_transactions
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), skip: int = 0, limit: int = 50 )

ctags.name: update_transaction
ctags.signature: ( trx_id: int, update: TransactionUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
